import React from 'react'; import './Signup.css'; import { useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import { Form,Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; function Signup() { const [profession,setprofession]=useState("Student"); const [user,setUser]=useState({ Email:"", Phone:"", N }); const handleChange=(e)=>{ setprofession(e.target.value); console.log(profession); } const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); console.log(e); } return (
) } export default Signup
